overview:
Anthony brings a unique set of talents mixing an unrelenting passion for technology with a proven business minded, entrepreneurial background. For more than 15 years, Anthony has been a leader in new business ventures using technology to solve business problems. He has been involved in multiple technology organizations in the mobile and enterprise software applications space.

Prior to founding Got Sync Music, Anthony was an angel investor via the Monition Partners angel fund, an advisor to multiple technology startups in the enterprise applications and mobile software space, and a Partner with the IT Strategy firm Thought Ensemble. Prior to Thought Ensemble, Anthony held multiple leadership roles as Founder and CEO of 2GO Software (A mobile SaaS enterprise application company), President and CTO of MP2 Solutions (a mobile hardware and software company), Founder and CEO of Amplific Technologies (A mobile software development company), as Founder of Imagio Productions (A rights managed stock photography company), and as a Software Engineer for the Microsoft Corporation.

Anthony is a fervent believer in giving back and currently acts as a mentor for several start-up and not-for-profit companies. On a regular basis Anthony spends time with the management of YouthForce (www.teenjobs.org), Youth In Focus (www.youthinfocus.org), and Global Visionaries (www.global-visionaries.org) assisting these organizations to view their non-profits like a for-profit business and build strategic operating plans that encourage them to realize rapid growth much like a startup company might. He also serves and has served on several nonprofit and community boards, including the West Seattle STEM School Design Committee, Entrepreneurs Foundation of North Texas (EFNT), the Network for Teaching Entrepreneurship (NFTE), Tech America (formerly known as AEA), TeXchange, an organization that promotes entrepreneurs and technology, and is a partner with the Seattle Social Venture Partners.
